addition.229:
*

If {@code edge} is a self-loop, the returned set will only have a single node.

removed.256:
*

If the graph is directed, the {@linkplain DirectedGraph#source(Object) source} and
removed.257: * {@linkplain DirectedGraph#target(Object) target} of the edges returned must be {@code node1}
removed.357:
*

If the graph is directed, {@code node1} is {@code edge}'s source,
removed.358: * {@code node2} is {@code edge}'s target, and {@code edge} is an outgoing edge of
removed.359: * {@code node1} and an incoming edge of {@code node2}.
